  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14718</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">La Lituania in numeri</string>
            <string language="en">Lithuania in Numbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Litauen in den Zahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Lithuanie dans les nombres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lithuania nos números</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λιθουανία στους αριθμούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lituania en números</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO suggerisce  numeri di teaching/learning mediante  fatti relativi alla  geografia lituana, di storia e di altri dati di base circa il paese. Si compone di 10 brevi attività di corrispondenza (5 ciascuno) e di parole incrociate (10 ).</string>
            <string language="en">This LO suggests teaching/learning Numerals through facts of Lithuanian geography, history and other basic data about the country. 
It is composed of 10 short matching activities (5 items each) and a crossword (10 items).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">numeri</string>
            <string language="en">numerals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE schlägt teaching/learning 
Ziffern durch Tatsachen der litauischen Geographie, der Geschichte und
anderer grundlegender Daten über das Land vor. Es besteht aus 
10 kurzen zusammenpassenden Aktivitäten (5 Einzelteile jedes) und 
einem Kreuzworträtsel (10 Einzelteile).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS suggère des chiffres de teaching/learning
par des faits de géographie lithuanienne, d'histoire et d'autres 
données de base sur le pays. Il se compose de 10 activités 
assorties courtes (5 éléments chacun) et de mots croisé (10 
éléments).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO sugere numeeses de teaching/learning 
com os fatos da geografia lithuanian, do history e de outros dados 
básicos sobre o país. É composto de 10 atividades combinando 
curtas (5 artigos cada um) e de um crossword (10 artigos).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO προτείνει/εκμάθησης αριθμοπαραστάσεις 
μέσω των γεγονότων της λιθουανικής γεωγραφίας, της ιστορίας και 
άλλων βασικών στοιχείων για τη χώρα. Αποτελείται από 10 
σύντομες ταιριάζοντας με δραστηριότητες (5 αντικείμενα κάθε ένα)
και ένα σταυρόλεξο (10 αντικείμενα).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO sugiere números de teaching/learning 
con hechos de la geografía lituana, de la historia y de otros datos 
básicos sobre el país. Se compone de 10 actividades que 
corresponden con cortas (5 items cada uno) y de un crucigrama (10 
items).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziffern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chiffres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">numeeses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αριθμοπαραστάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">números</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">U-U</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO può essere usato per consolidare o rivedere le conoscenze e far pratica di competenze nell'uso dei numeri (inclusi grandi numeri composti di tre o più cifre) allorchè si parla di date, distanze, temperature, percentuali, etc. Può anche aiutare ad imparare e ripassare fatti fondamentali sulla Lituania che possono essere usati come informazione per visitare il paese o per partecipare a vari progetti europei.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO can be used to consolidate/revise the knowledge of and practise the skills in using numerals (including large numbers composed of three and more figures) when reading/speaking about dates, distances, temperatures, percentage, etc.
It can also help to learn/revise basic facts about Lithuania to be used as background information while travelling the country or participating in various European projects.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>

        </rights>
